pullRequest.title: Delete Account and Withdraw API changes - Android

commit.message: deleted fda directory to fix building issue
Fixed app crash issue due to package name changes
Updated Github Workflow file to fix, Make gradlew executable issue
Renamed valuePickerQuestion.java to ValuePickerQuestion.java to meet Google Style Guide

Style Guide changes & Code optimization

1. Google Style Guide changes
2. Deleted unused files
3. App configuration changes
4. Created api properties file to include API configs
5. Added Logger file
6. Applied code optimization changes.
Updated Google Copyright on Logger.java file

API updates

UserRegistrationServer, ResponseServer and AuthServer API integration updated.

1. Updated Delete Account and Withdraw API calls
2. Removed Unwanted comments
